EmailTemplate.description: IN USE This email is sent to Applicants by a batch process to Create Payment Request
EmailTemplate.name: GG Create Payment Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Payment Request #{!PaymentRequest__c.Name} Task has been Created
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Payment Request {!PaymentRequest__c.Name}task has been created.
This email is to notify you that a Payment Request {!PaymentRequest__c.Name} task has been created.
Please login to EGMS System to create and submit the task.
Payment Request Details:
Grant Number: {!PaymentRequest__c.FederalGrantNumber__c}
Budget Period: {!PaymentRequest__c.BudgetPeriod__c}
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
